overview: Constable Chan was able to fulfill his lifelong goal of catching the notorious bandit before his retirement. However, Tiger escaped from jail soon after and killed Constable Chan. To revenge his father's death, Chan's son turns to Shaolin monks for help, so he can fight against Tiger and his mysterious, masked accomplice. SHAOLIN DISCIPLE is a wall to wall kung fu fighting with a shocking climax
tagline: Get ready for the fight of your life
title: Shaolin Disciple
